text: The Archaeological Museum of Sitia is a museum in Sitia of Crete, in Greece. Its collection consists of Minoan-era finds from Sitia, Zakros, Petra and Palaikastro. ==See also== * Palaikastro Kouros ==External links== *Hellenic Ministry of Culture and Tourism / in Greek *ancient-greece.org *www.interkriti.org *www.planetware.com * Sitia Category:Buildings and structures in Lasithi
title: Archaeological Museum of Sitia
